depfile.yaml.contents:
paths:
    - ./src
exclude_files:
    - '#.*test.*#'
layers:
    -
        name: Controller
        collectors:
            -
                type: className
                regex: .*Controller.*
    -
        name: Repository
        collectors:
            -
                type: className
                regex: .*Repository.*
    -
        name: Service
        collectors:
            -
                type: className
                regex: .*Service.*
ruleset:
    Controller:
        - Service
    Service:
        - Repository
    Repository:
